A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: How is it possible to decimate the greatest franchise in movie history?  Yes\, the plot sucked...yes\, the character development was non-existent...and yes\, THE Jedi Master milks a space cow.  But...how on earth did the script get signed off?  At times\, it felt like I was watching an episode of Sex in the City.  The Lost Jedi is the most disappointing movie I have ever experienced.  A complete disaster\, and ultimately...very sad.
